name: .QCOW2 File Extension
summary: Learn about .QCOW2 files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can mount a QCOW2 disk image and use it to create a virtual machine in QEMU (cross-platform) and some other virtualization programs. 7-Zip and Smart Projects IsoBuster can also open and extract data from QCOW2 files in Windows.
QEMU can create and modify QCOW2 files, as well. For more information, refer to QEMU's official documentation.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
